about: I am passionate about crafting innovative digital solutions as a Full-stack Web3 Developer. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, coupled with expertise in blockchain development, I strive to create impactful and cutting-edge applications that push the boundaries of what's possible.

projects.title: Byte Bunch
projects.description: Byte Bunch is a versatile NFT project based on the ERC-721 standard, offering users the ability to mint, own, and trade unique digital assets.

projects.title: CIVF
projects.description: a website for the nonprofit Charusat Innovative Ventures Foundation, which aims to support aspiring entrepreneurs and innovators in creating their own startups.
